text: Dionatan do Nascimento Teixeira (24 July 1992 – 5 November 2017) was a professional footballer. He played as a centre-back. He was best known for playing for Stoke City F.C. from 2014 to 2017. On 5 November 2017 Teixeira suffered a fatal heart attack in Londrina, Brazil at the age of 25. ==Statistics== Source: Club Season League Cup League Cup Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals MFK Košice 2009–10 Slovak Super Liga 2 0 0 0 — — 2 0 MFK Košice 2010–11 Slovak Super Liga 0 0 0 0 — — 0 0 MFK Košice 2011–12 Slovak Super Liga 0 0 0 0 — — 0 0 Baník Ružiná 2012–13 Slovak 2.
